segments.text: Well , if you have no further questions , then we have done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Owens , for taking time out of your busy schedule to interview me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re welcome . I appreciate your coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When can I contact you about your final decision ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to consider several other applicants and we hope to make a decision by the end of this month . We will call you regardless of whether you are hired or not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks a lot ! I will look forward to the good news . Please call me at this number between nine and eleven in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I really appreciate your coming today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The pleasure is mine . It ’ s nice talking with you . Good-bye , Mr . Owens .
segments.speaker: S2
